app.title: Website Security Scanner
app.subtitle: Quickly detect website security vulnerabilities and protect your website security

home.inputPlaceholder: Enter the website URL to scan (e.g., https://example.com)
home.step1Desc: Enter the website address in the input box above
home.step2Desc: Select security scan items as needed
home.step3Desc: Click the "Start Scan" button and wait for the results

scanResult.title: Security Scan Report
scanResult.sslRecommendation: Strengthen SSL/TLS configuration, update SSL certificates, enable HSTS, disable insecure protocol versions
scanResult.headersRecommendation: Add security headers like Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options
scanResult.regularCheckRecommendation: Perform comprehensive security scans monthly to identify potential risks

history.title: Scan History
history.description: Manage and view your website security scan records

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid HTTP or HTTPS address
errors.scanFailed: Scan failed, please try again later
